title: Sarah's Solace
description: While wandering through the woods after a car accident, 16-year-old Sarah meets Ethan, a beautiful and mysterious guy who offers to help her. While brought together by their fateful circumstances, Sarah discovers the devastating truth that Ethan is not who he appears to be. They then must choose between their existence together and their destinies, hoping that a love two souls share will never die.
author: Wendy Risher
